Font Awesome Icons Complete

  • Icons - Font Awesome
Icons - Font Awesome fas
    • HTML

Usage

Icon listings

For a list of all the icons and identifiers that can be used, please visit the Font Awesome Icon page

Class Name Description
material-icons

Apply this required class to a <span> tag. Then use a material icon identifier within the <span> tag.
